title: This Intense Ski Workout Can Give Anyone ‘Eccentric Strength’
itunes:title: This Intense Ski Workout Can Give Anyone ‘Eccentric Strength’
description:
Bloomberg Pursuits Freelance Writer Tim Sohn talks about Shred, a new fitness concept that appeals to skiers and non-skiers alike.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
